value.title: Coffee importers stockpiling on fears over coronavirus lockdowns
value.excerpt: Coffee importers in some of the largest consuming countries are stockpiling, bringing forward orders by up to a month to avoid shortages if supply chains are disrupted by coronavirus lockdowns.
